DOC.brief_summary: This post-marketing surveillance study design collect safety information post-vaccination adverse event adverse reaction recipient Arepanrix® ( H1N1 ) Intramuscular Injection . The following item investigate priority investigation item . < Priority investigation item > 1 . Allergic reactions 2 . Anaphylaxis
DOC.criteria: Subjects receive Arepanrix® intramuscular injection first time
